name: ExtractedAttributeData
description: This interface represents the extracted attribute data from a WebGL program. It extends the `Attribute` interface but omits the `buffer` property. It includes an optional `location` property that indicates where the shader location is for this attribute.

properties.name: location
properties.description: set where the shader location is for this attribute

properties.name: program
location
properties.type:
0, // set further down..
            format,
            stride: getAttributeInfoFromFormat(format).stride,
            offset: 0,
            instance: false,
            start: 0,
        }
